long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Let you know which important events, births and deaths occurred on this day in history â€” without requesting any extra permissions!

When people open this extension, they will select the date at that time and display which important events happened on this day in history. Users can also check which important people were born and which important people died on this day.

Users can also select any day in the past to view these important events.
